title: A stocking stuffer that keeps things from going missing
content:
Macworld

Tired of the “Where are my keys?” game? Ethos Smart Trackers have your back. This 2-pack of sleek, Apple Find My-compatible trackers for $34.99 makes it easy to locate lost items in seconds. Keys, wallets, backpacks, you name it — just clip on the included holders, and these trackers are ready to keep tabs on your essentials.

With secure pairing and precise real-time tracking, they integrate seamlessly into the Apple Find My ecosystem. Lost your bag at the airport? Check the app to pinpoint its exact location. Can’t find your wallet in your house? Activate the sound feature and follow the ping. Built for durability and daily use, these trackers are sleek enough to blend in but powerful enough to save the day.

Compact and practical, this 2-pack of Ethos Smart Trackers on sale for the Black Friday price of $34.99 (reg. $69) is the ultimate stocking stuffer for anyone who needs a little help staying organized.

Give the gift of no more frantic searches — and maybe grab a set for yourself while you’re at it.
